pr_title: DG-410 Fix doc/defaults in Avro converter

timeline.bodyText: We should keep the doc calls in this test and modify what we expect.
timeline.author: rayokota
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -503,22 +490,35 @@ public void testFromConnectComplexWithDefaults() {
     org.apache.avro.Schema avroSchema = org.apache.avro.SchemaBuilder
         .record(AvroData.DEFAULT_SCHEMA_NAME).namespace(AvroData.NAMESPACE) // default values
         .fields()
-        .name("int8").doc("int8 field").type(int8Schema).withDefault(2)
-        .name("int16").doc("int16 field").type(int16Schema).withDefault(12)
-        .name("int32").doc("int32 field").type(int32Schema).withDefault(12)
-        .name("int64").doc("int64 field").type(int64Schema).withDefault(12L)
-        .name("float32").doc("float32 field").type(float32Schema).withDefault(12.2f)
-        .name("float64").doc("float64 field").type(float64Schema).withDefault(12.2)
-        .name("boolean").doc("bool field").type(boolSchema).withDefault(true)
-        .name("string").doc("string field").type(stringSchema).withDefault("foo")
-        .name("bytes").doc("bytes field").type(bytesSchema).withDefault(ByteBuffer.wrap("foo".getBytes()))
+        .name("int8").type(int8Schema).withDefault(2)
+        .name("int16").type(int16Schema).withDefault(12)
+        .name("int32").type(int32Schema).withDefault(12)
+        .name("int64").type(int64Schema).withDefault(12L)
+        .name("float32").type(float32Schema).withDefault(12.2f)
+        .name("float64").type(float64Schema).withDefault(12.2)
+        .name("boolean").type(boolSchema).withDefault(true)
+        .name("string").type(stringSchema).withDefault("foo")
+        .name("bytes").type(bytesSchema).withDefault(ByteBuffer.wrap("foo".getBytes()))
         .name("array").type(arraySchema).withDefault(Arrays.asList("a", "b", "c"))

replies.bodyText: avroSchema (what we expect) will not have field doc because we will no longer add content of connect.doc to avro field's doc, it will have the connect.doc property at field schema level instead.
replies.author: xiaoyali97

timeline.author: rayokota

     org.apache.avro.Schema avroSchema = org.apache.avro.SchemaBuilder

         .endRecord();

timeline.bodyText: I think we still need tests to cover record-level docs from Connect schema to Avro schema.
timeline.author: rayokota

replies.bodyText:
The Avro spec https://avro.apache.org/docs/current/spec.html#schema_primitive states

Primitive types have no specified attributes.

So only complex type schema will have connect.record.doc.
Primitive type can only have connect.field.doc because the current implementation can't distinguish a primitive schema from being a field level schema or is itself a record level schema.
replies.author: xiaoyali97

timeline.message: update AvroDataTest.java to reflect change for doc handling
add change for handling default value

timeline.bodyText: We don't need this null check since it is already performed a few lines above.
timeline.author: rayokota

timeline.bodyText:
Change to
String fieldDoc = schema.parameters() != null ? schema.parameters().getOrDefault(AVRO_FIELD_DOC_PREFIX_PROP + field.name(), null) : null;
We check for != null for consistency with other parts of the code.
Performing get after containsKey is generally an anti-pattern.
timeline.author: rayokota

timeline.bodyText: Let's switch fromConnectContext and fieldDoc so that fromConnectContext is last.  Generally we want context objects to always be the first or last parameter.
timeline.author: rayokota

timeline.bodyText: Let's merge this method with parametersFromConnect by just adding the check for AVRO_FIELD_DEFAULT_FLAG_PROP to parametersFromConnect and removing this method.
timeline.author: rayokota

timeline.message:
AvroData.toConnectSchema(): stop propagate the schema's doc to the field's doc
AvroData.fromConnectSchema(): stop adding schema's doc to property
use avro.* properties to preserve AVRO Schema's doc
update AvroDataTest.java to reflect change for doc handling
change AVRO_ENUM_DOC_PROP to AVRO_ENUM_DOC_PREFIX_PROP, update related test; also add check for connectMetadata boolean
add change for handling default value
handle type conversion in defaultValueFromConnect(), remove defaultValueToConnect() method, then update related test

timeline.bodyText: Let's comment this property, something like "This property is used to determine whether a default value in the Connect schema originated from an Avro field default."
timeline.author: rayokota
rayokota
